description.text: Mm. Don't that moral superiority taste good? You feel all kinds of smarter now; who cares about vitamin B12 deficiency?
SMRT. Repeat after me slowly, you are now...SMRRRRRRRT.
You feel distinctly slippery, slimy and hard to get ahold of.
Your tummy hurts from eating food that had clearly gone bad. Either you were very desperate, or very stupid.
Your belly size has temporarily increased! Good thing no one's going to comment on your weight in the dungeon.

You baby-eating monster! You not-friendly friend! You...you GRAND MASTER OF ALL THINGS BAD! I TOLD you, didn't I? I TOLD you not to eat the egg, and even explained WHY you shouldn't have eaten it. I mean, why did you do it? Curiosity? Cruelty? Contrariness? If there's a big red button with 'do not push' on it, are you going to push the thing anyway just to see what all that fuss is about? You know what, I don't care any more; say hello to Karma Arceus for me.
That was simply...wonderful.

Yes, minotaur society was this rigid and brutal before they even had contact with the outside world. But by doing this, you're enabling - no, supporting this cruel way of life and the matriarchs' traditional grip over their people. Even if the end result tastes lip-smackingly good.
I say, good chap. Could you be so kind as to give those uncouth ruffians over there what-for? It'd definitely be a jolly good show.
So much sugar in your system is making you feel sick, if hyper.
You gotta pity the foo' who thinks they're too good for milk.
Behold, the power of FRUIT!
Seriously, drinking something with a name like 'Hurricane' should've tipped you off.
The pure, sparkling water makes you feel more refreshed than your standard drink.
You ingested the Protein! Your Attack increa...oh, wait, you don't have effort values, do you?

Ugh, that tasted simply awful! Hope it's as potent a tonic as they say.
Just...gotta have a little more of that skoom - I mean, stuff. I can stop any time I want. Really.
You're seeing things. You're hearing things, too. They're not altogether unpleasant, though.
AUUUGGGHHH! AAA! AAA! AARRGGGHHH! FOOD AND SLEEP IS FOR THE WEAK! WHY CAN'T I STOP YELLING?
You know, there's a reason why people don't use items made for pokemon. In another game, we would call this status effect 'Moogled'.

option.name: Shocking Revelations of a Charged Mind

description.text: You have been granted the ability to do combo attacks!
Can you feel it? There is nothing here at all. Time isn't flowing. Space isn't stable. Not quite a world, but at least a small space about you where the rules are broken.
The Fairywodger heals you by way of tingling fungal power.
This guy's armour has been violently ripped apart.
This spell causes rock to explode from beneath an enemy's feet.
Ghouls and ghosts beware.
Ghouls and ghosts beware.
Creates pointed stones that float in the air and deal damage when stepped into.
Ugh! Oil! Well, let's hope you don't end up in the deep-fat fryer.
Frozen to the ground, eh?
A burst of holy wrath.
Seems like the remote held.
The draconic goddess Obsidia has turned a baleful eye on you for slaying her children and defiling her shrine.
The draconic goddess Obsidia has turned a baleful eye on you for slaying her children and defiling her shrine.
Your magical abilities have been siphoned away, leaving you wondering why your spells are fizzling.
Your magical abilities have been siphoned off, making even the smallest of cantrips immensely difficult to cast.
Yuck! Thick, disgusting gunk plasters your body and prevents you from attacking!
description.monsterText: spews thick, disgusting gunk all over you!

description.text: Blast your ememies with a concentrated burst of light! This spell does righteous damage.
Stun an enemy with a touch from your short-range haywire energies and make your getaway while they're blinded--if they're not dead already!
Your more unstable energies are contained within your personal magnetic field. How long can you keep this up before you turn into a rampaging Japanese monster?

That's what you get for unnecessarily exposing yourself: your defenses are reduced and you're in danger of meltdown! There's no speedy cure for this; you must hurry away and wait for your energies to realign themselves naturally!
You have learnt the hard way that it's not just little girls bearing buckets of water you have to watch out for.
Drain your enemies with this beam!
Uh-oh. Your energies have been disrupted and they're spinning out of control! Run away bravely, Sir Robin!
You may have seen everything, but do you KNOW everything?
Makes invisible enemies visible, debuffs their resistance and reflect severely.
Smite thine enemies with the power of the rainbow! You probably won't find it super effective, but it won't be not very effective, either. Now if only this was a pokemon match...
You're melting! You're MEEEELTINNNG!
FLAME! DEATH! DESTRUCTION! Now let us show them who is the true lord of Blackr--I mean, this dungeon!
Unstable energies swirl around you, warping reality where they pass.
Damage and stun aura.
The actual mine that does the teleportation work.
Forgive me, Generic Monster; your death only adds to my failure. Roaring that loudly has made your throat all scratchy and sore, so take a moment to recover before doing anything else.
